cluster_relations.rel_desc: Participation in sports helps individuals develop teamwork.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject activity or domain (e.g., participation in sports, sports) causally promotes the development or acquisition of the object skills, traits, or lessons in participants.
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Life Skills and Lessons from Sports
remarks: More granular relation derived from the enumerated list.
More granular relation derived from the enumerated list.
More granular relation derived from the enumerated list.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Athletes learn how to deal with success as part of sports participation.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an agent acquires or develops the capability to effectively handle or cope with a particular outcome or situation.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Athletes learn how to deal with failure as part of sports participation.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an agent acquires or develops the capability to effectively handle or cope with a particular outcome or situation.

args.justification: Both relations describe athletes causally acquiring the ability to handle specific outcomes (success or failure) through sports experiences. This is closer to a causal acquisition process than a generic state change, so aligning rel_cls_group from MODIFICATION to CAUSALITY makes it consistent with the first relation and with the causal hints in rel_desc and qualifiers.

executed_decisions.justification: Both relations describe athletes causally acquiring the ability to handle specific outcomes (success or failure) through sports experiences. This is closer to a causal acquisition process than a generic state change, so aligning rel_cls_group from MODIFICATION to CAUSALITY makes it consistent with the first relation and with the causal hints in rel_desc and qualifiers.
